summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Forgot Password feature. All backend API tests passed (10/10). Frontend UI tests passed - forgot password link visible on login page, forgot password form works, reset password form works, complete E2E flow verified (register -> forgot password -> reset -> login with new password). Both Danish and English translations working correctly.
passed_tests: Backend: /api/auth/forgot-password returns token for valid email
Backend: /api/auth/forgot-password does not reveal non-existent email
Backend: Complete password reset flow (register -> forgot -> reset -> login)
Backend: Reset token cannot be reused
Backend: Admin can request password reset
Backend: Admin login still works with original credentials
Frontend: Login page shows 'Glemt adgangskode?' link with data-testid
Frontend: Forgot password link navigates to /forgot-password
Frontend: Forgot password form has email input and submit button
Frontend: Forgot password shows success message with test token link
Frontend: Reset password page shows form with password fields
Frontend: Reset password without token shows error state
Frontend: Complete E2E flow - password reset and login with new password
Frontend: Danish translations working (Glemt adgangskode, Nulstil adgangskode)
Frontend: English translations working (Forgot Password, Reset Password)
seed_data_creation: Created test users during E2E testing (cleaned up after tests)
context_for_next_testing_agent: Password reset feature fully implemented and tested. Routes /forgot-password and /reset-password are working. Backend endpoints /api/auth/forgot-password and /api/auth/reset-password are functional. Token is returned in API response for testing purposes (no email sending). Reset tokens stored in MongoDB 'password_resets' collection with 1-hour expiry. Tokens are marked as used after successful reset to prevent reuse.
